com.gtomato.android.ui.transformer

Class FlatMerryGoRoundTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gtomato.android.ui.transformer.FlatMerryGoRoundTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CarouselView.ViewTransformer

    public class FlatMerryGoRoundTransformer
extends java.lang.Object
implements CarouselView.ViewTransformer
    Simulate a Merry-go-round carousel.

    This is a 'flat' version that item views are not rotated and always face front.

    Available parameters:
    • setNumPies(int) number of item views to be distributed across the circle evenly. Default 7
    • setHorizontalViewPort(double) % of parent width to be used for display. Default 80%
    • setViewPerspective(double) normalized camera height. Default 0.6
    • setFarScale(double) scale of itemview when it is layout at a far distance (y = 0). Default 0.35
    • setFarAlpha(double) alpha of itemview when it is layout at a far distance (y = 0). Default 0

      • transform

        public void transform(android.view.View view,
                      float position)
        Description copied from interface: CarouselView.ViewTransformer
        Transform a given item view based on position. Usually translate, rotation, alpha, visibility, ... may be altered.
        Specified by:
        transform in interface CarouselView.ViewTransformer
        Parameters:
        view - Item view
        position - For example, 0 for the current center-most item at a stable position; 4 for 4-th item at the right to the current item; -3 for 3-rd item at the left to the current item; 0.1 for the current item with 10% offset right to its stable position.
